# WrappedError class
<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esdmr/assert/errors](./esdmr.assert.errors.md) &gt; [WrappedError](./esdmr.assert.errors.wrappederror.md)


Wrapper for any thrown value. It provides extra context to errors and assertions. Internally it uses [PrimitiveError](./esdmr.assert.errors.primitiveerror.md) to wrap the original thrown value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class WrappedError extends Error 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Error

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(message, thrownValue)](./esdmr.assert.errors.wrappederror._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>WrappedError</code> class |
